videos.headline: Clemson wins the coin toss
videos.description: Peyton Manning and Steve Spurrier accompany Clemson and Alabama for the opening coin toss, won by the Tigers.

videos.headline: Alabama forces early turnover with stop on fourth-and-1
videos.description: Clemson's Wayne Gallman gets stopped on 4th down and Alabama takes over.

videos.headline: Watson takes big hit to the head
videos.description: A high hit on Deshaun Watson results in a first down for Clemson due to unnecessary roughness.

videos.headline: Scarbrough scores Alabama's first TD
videos.description: Bo Scarbrough takes off for 25 yards to put the Crimson Tide up 7-0.

videos.headline: Crimson Tide strike first in Tampa
videos.description: Alabama RB Bo Scarbrough rushes 25 yards down the sideline and dives into the end zone for a touchdown, putting the Crimson Tide up 7-0 over Clemson.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Crimson Tide strike first in Tampa) 2017/01/09 ESHEET ENHL

videos.headline: Targeting not called after Clemson's Williams takes hit to the head
videos.description: Clemson WR Mike Williams takes a big hit to the head, but no targeting call is made.

videos.headline: Clemson partially blocks Bama's punt
videos.description: Clemson gets great field position after blocking Alabama's punt.

videos.headline: Watson can't handle snap, Alabama recovers fumble
videos.description: Alabama takes over after Deshaun Watson mishandles the snap and fumbles.

videos.headline: Bama recovers bad Clemson snap
videos.description: Clemson QB DeShaun Watson can't handle the low snap and Alabama LB Ryan Anderson dives in to recover it in Tigers territory.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Bama recovers bad Clemson snap) 2017/01/09 ESHEET ENHL

videos.headline: Stewart breaks free for 25-yard run
videos.description: ArDarius Stewart runs for 25 yards to the Clemson 49 for a first down.

videos.headline: Scarbrough scores for second time in first half
videos.description: Bo Scarbrough takes the handoff for the 37-yard touchdown run, putting Alabama up 14-0.

videos.headline: Cain takes screen pass 44 yards for Clemson first down
videos.description: Deshaun Watson's screen pass complete to Deon Cain for 44 yards to the Alabama 39 for a first down.

videos.headline: Scarbrough does it to Clemson again
videos.description: Alabama RB Bo Scarbrough breaks a couple of tackles on his way to a 37-yard touchdown, extending the Crimson Tide's lead to 14-0 over Clemson.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Scarbrough does it to Clemson again) 2017/01/09 ESHEET ENHL

videos.headline: Watson puts Clemson on the board
videos.description: Deshaun Watson finds the end zone on an 8-yard touchdown run, cutting Alabama's lead to 14-7.

videos.headline: Watson takes huge hit on pass attempt
videos.description: Deshaun Watson is hit hard on a pass attempt, forcing Clemson to punt on the drive.

videos.headline: Scarbrough's scores keep Alabama up going into second half
videos.description: Alabama gets two rushing touchdowns from Bo Scarbrough and Deshaun Watson scores for Clemson as the Crimson Tide lead 14-7 at halftime of the College Football Playoff National Championship.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Scarbrough's scores keep Alabama up at halftime) 2017/01/09 ESHEET ENHL

videos.headline: Watson scampers for 8-yard TD run
videos.description: DeShaun Watson puts Clemson on the scoreboard in the National Championship Game with an 8-yard touchdown run.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Watson scampers for 8-yard TD run) 2017/01/09 ESHEET ENHL

videos.headline: Bo Scarbrough looking like Derrick Henry
videos.description: Just like Derrick Henry did last year in the title game, Bo Scarbrough put up a big run to put Alabama on the board first in this year's College Football Playoff National Championship.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Bo Scarbrough looking like Derrick Henry) 2017/01/09 ESHEET

videos.headline: Alabama forces fumble on opening drive of second half
videos.description: Clemson's Wayne Gallman fumbles on the first possession of the second half, setting Alabama up with great field position.

videos.headline: Renfrow's TD keeps Clemson in the game
videos.description: Clemson's Hunter Renfrow catches and runs 24 Yards for a touchdown, bringing the Tigers within 3.

videos.headline: Watson takes big hit trying to get first down
videos.description: Deshaun Watson suffers another big hit and is spun in midair while attempting to run for a first down.

videos.headline: Clemson clawing back in Tampa
videos.description: Clemson QB Deshaun Watson passes the ball to WR Hunter Renfrow, who goes 24 yards for a touchdown as the Tigers cut the deficit to 17-14 against the Crimson Tide.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Clemson clawing back in Tampa) 2017/01/09 ESHEET ENHL

videos.headline: Scarbrough goes down with broken leg after short run
videos.description: Alabama's Bo Scarbrough leaves the game after suffering a broken bone in his lower right leg on a 5-yard run.

videos.headline: Alabama connects on deep pass for touchdown
videos.description: Jalen Hurts completes a 68-yard touchdown pass to O.J. Howard to extend Alabama's lead to 24-14.

videos.headline: Williams goes down with second injury of the game
videos.description: Clemson's Mike Williams suffers his second injury of the game on attempted deep reception.

videos.headline: Watson finds Williams for easy score
videos.description: Deshaun Watson connects with Mike Williams on the 4-yard touchdown pass to bring Clemson within three.

videos.headline: O.J. Howard burns Clemson D for 68-yard TD
videos.description: O.J. Howard speeds past the Clemson defense and Jalen Hurts takes advantage, finding Howard for the 68-yard touchdown connection.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (O.J. Howard burns Clemson D for 68-yard TD) 2017/01/09 ESHEET ENHL

videos.headline: Tigers keeping it close in Tampa
videos.description: Clemson QB Deshaun Watson finds WR Mike Williams on a nice fade route for a  4-yard touchdown, cutting the deficit again to three points against the Crimson Tide.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Tigers keeping it close in Tampa) 2017/01/09 ESHEET ENHL

videos.headline: Williams makes great leaping catch
videos.description: Mike Williams finds the ball at its highest point to make a great catch for the first down.

videos.headline: Gallman leaps in for Clemson TD
videos.description: Wayne Gallman's 1-yard touchdown run gives Clemson its first lead of the game at 28-24.

videos.headline: Alabama's double pass leads to first down
videos.description: Alabama WR ArDarius Stewart connects with O.J. Howard for a first down.

videos.headline: Alabama reclaims lead on Hurts' TD run
videos.description: Jalen Hurts' 30-yard touchdown run gives Alabama back the lead at 31-28.

videos.headline: Williams rises up for another great catch
videos.description: Deshaun Watson finds Mike Williams for a 25-yard gain.

videos.headline: Great catch sets Clemson up with first and goal
videos.description: Jordan Legget hauls in the pass from Deshaun Watson to put the Tiger's within the 10-yard line with 14 seconds left.

videos.headline: Alabama pass interference gives Clemson ball on 2
videos.description: Alabama called for pass interference in final seconds of game setting up Clemson touchdown.

videos.headline: Watson throws winning TD in waning seconds of 2017 CFP title game
videos.description: With only seconds remaining, Deshaun Watson finds Hunter Renfrow for a touchdown to give Clemson a 35-31 lead over Alabama.

videos.headline: Williams, Watson, Gallman all contribute to TD drive
videos.description: Mike Williams makes a spectacular catch, DeShaun Watson dazzles with a hurdle and Wayne Gallman caps the drive off with a Clemson touchdown.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Williams, Watson, Gallman all contribute to TD drive) 2017/01/09 ESHEET ENHL

videos.headline: On this date: Clemson shocks Alabama to win national title
videos.description: After a back-and-forth fourth quarter with numerous lead changes, Deshaun Watson throws the winning touchdown pass with one second remaining to give Clemson a 35-31 win over Alabama in the College Football Playoff National Championship.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Clemson shocks Alabama to win national title) 2017/01/09 ESHEET ENHL

videos.headline: Watson hits Renfrow for game-winning TD in title game
videos.description: On Jan. 9, 2017, Deshaun Watson puts Clemson ahead with a 2-yard touchdown to Hunter Renfrow to win the CFP National Championship.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Watson hits Renfrow for game-winning TD in title game) 2017/01/09 ESHEET ENHL

videos.headline: Swinney: It's a blessing to win championship
videos.description: Clemson coach Dabo Swinney reacts to his team defeating Alabama 35-31 to win the College Football Playoff National Championship.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Interview (Swinney: It's a blessing to win championship) 2017/01/09

videos.headline: Boulware amped after winning national title
videos.description: Ben Boulware is clearly excited after Clemson's national title victory and thanks several Tiger football alums in his speech.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Interview (Boulware amped after winning national title) 2017/01/09
